dc_title_s: Mappemonde en deux hemispheres E. Soulier, del.
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures. Map no. 3 from: Atlas élémentaire simplifié de géographie ancienne et moderne. Paris prime meridian. Includes ancillary world map (2 hemispheres) using polar projection, diagram comparing sizes of the continents, and table of heights of principal mountains of the world. 1 map; 2 hemispheres each 24 cm. in diam., on sheet 47 x 63 cm.
